project.card

Class AbilityCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.card.Card
      • project.card.AbilityCard

  • public class AbilityCard
extends Card
    Class represents an Ability card. These cards apply an immediate effect when played.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class project.card.Card

        Card.ability

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class project.card.Card

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbilityCard

        public AbilityCard(java.lang.String name,
           int cost,
           java.lang.String image,
           java.lang.String d,
           Card.ability a)
        Initializes a standard Ability Card
        Parameters:
        name - the Ability Card's name
        cost - the Ability Card's cost, taken from the Player's wcp resource
        image - the String representing an Ability Card's image path
        d - the description of the ability
        a - the implementation of the ability enumerated type

        a nicely formatted String representing an Ability Card's attributes
